verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they came \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethphage|strong="G0967"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*, \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*, he sendeth \w forth|strong="G0649"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go your way|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the village|strong="G2968"\+w* \+w over against|strong="G2713"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as soon as|strong="G2112"\+w* \+w ye be entered|strong="G1531"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w ye shall find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w a colt|strong="G4454"\+w* \+w tied|strong="G1210"\+w*, \+w whereon|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w sat|strong="G2523"\+w*; \+w loose|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and bring|strong="G0071"\+w* \+add him\+add*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do ye|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w*? \+w say ye|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w of him|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w straightway|strong="G2112"\+w* \+w he will send|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hither|strong="G5602"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they went their \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w colt|strong="G4454"\w* \w tied|strong="G1210"\w* \w by|strong="G4314"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* a place where two ways \w met|strong="G0296"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w loose|strong="G3089"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* do \w ye|strong="G4160"\w*, \w loosing|strong="G3089"\w* the \w colt|strong="G4454"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w commanded|strong="G1781"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w let|strong="G0863"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w go|strong="G0863"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* the \w colt|strong="G4454"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G1911"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w spread|strong="G4766"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w* cut \w down|strong="G2875"\w* \w branches|strong="G4746"\w* \w off|strong="G1537"\w* the \w trees|strong="G1186"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strawed|strong="G4766"\w* \add them\add* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* went \w before|strong="G4254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w*, \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Hosanna|strong="G5614"\w*; \w Blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add is\add* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

\w Blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add be\add* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w Hosanna|strong="G5614"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w highest|strong="G5310"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: and \w when|strong="G2532"\w* he had looked round about \w upon|strong="G4017"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, and \w now|strong="G2235"\w* the \w eventide|strong="G3798"\w* was \w come|strong="G5607"\w*, he went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="G1887"\w*, when \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w come|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*, he was \w hungry|strong="G3983"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeing|strong="G1492"\w* a fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* afar \w off|strong="G3113"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w leaves|strong="G5444"\w*, he \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w haply|strong="G0686"\w* he might \w find|strong="G2147"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w thereon|strong="G0846"\w*: and \w when|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w leaves|strong="G5444"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* of \w figs|strong="G4810"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add yet\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w No man|strong="G3367"\+w* \+w eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w hereafter|strong="G3371"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G0165"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it.\add*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, and \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w overthrew|strong="G2690"\w* the \w tables|strong="G5132"\w* of the \w moneychangers|strong="G2855"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seats|strong="G2515"\w* of them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \w doves|strong="G4058"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G0863"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w suffer|strong="G0863"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w carry|strong="G1308"\w* \add any\add* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Is it|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w shall be called|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w of all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w nations|strong="G1484"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of prayer|strong="G4335"\+w*? \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w have made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w a den|strong="G4693"\+w* \+w of thieves|strong="G3027"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* they might \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* was \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w even|strong="G3796"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, he \w went|strong="G1607"\w* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* in the \w morning|strong="G4404"\w*, as they passed \w by|strong="G3899"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* dried \w up|strong="G3583"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w roots|strong="G4491"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* calling to \w remembrance|strong="G0363"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Master|strong="G4461"\w*, \w behold|strong="G1492"\w*, the fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w cursedst|strong="G2672"\w* is withered \w away|strong="G3583"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w in God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w mountain|strong="G3735"\+w*, \+w Be thou removed|strong="G0142"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be thou cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the sea|strong="G2281"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1252"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w doubt|strong="G1252"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G2588"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w shall believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w those things which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w saith|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w shall come to pass|strong="G1096"\+w*; \+w he shall have|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w he saith|strong="G2036"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Therefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w What things soever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w ye desire|strong="G0154"\+w*, \+w when ye pray|strong="G4336"\+w*, \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+add them\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w shall have|strong="G2071"\+w* \+add them\+add*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w ye stand|strong="G4739"\+w* \+w praying|strong="G4336"\+w*, \+w forgive|strong="G0863"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w ought|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w any|strong="G5100"\+w*: \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w which is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w may forgive|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w trespasses|strong="G3900"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w do|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w forgive|strong="G0863"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w will|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w which is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w forgive|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w trespasses|strong="G3900"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, there \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* doest \w thou|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I will|strong="G1905"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G1905"\+w* \+w of you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w question|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w answer|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I will tell|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w I do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The baptism|strong="G0908"\+w* \+w of John|strong="G2491"\+w*, \+w was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w*? \+w answer|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w reasoned|strong="G3049"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* we shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w From|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; he will \w say|strong="G2046"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* did \w ye|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \add men\add* \w counted|strong="G2192"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3689"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w We|strong="G1492"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w do I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w I do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.\wj*
